overview: Prerequisites for the core subjects in the Primary Years Programme specialisation:
1. EDUC90333 Introduction to the IB is a prerequisite for EDUC90261 Curriculum Frameworks in the IB PYP
2. EDUC90331 Assessment & Reporting in the IB is a prerequisite for EDUC90260 IB PYP Advanced

Structure: Completion of all of the following subjects:

Structure.EDUC90261: Curriculum Frameworks in the IB PYP Credits
Structure.EDUC90331: Assessment & Reporting in the IB Credits
